price: 4. Una digo kuwa yidhaahda: Alle Wuxuu leeyahay wiil (ama ilmo).
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
